profile_op.desc: Manage account information used by products and services.

info.nicknameDesc: Your account nickname will be shown to other users of our products and services.

imageChangeModal.desc: The profile image is visible to all users.

nicknameChangeModal.desc: If you change your nickname, the changed nickname applies to products and services.

passwordQuestionModal.title: Change password reset question/answer
passwordQuestionModal.desc: You can reset your password by asking/answering for your account ID and password.
passwordQuestionModal.question: Forgot password question/answer
passwordQuestionModal.questionPlaceholder: Please select the question you want
questionList: What is the name of your first pet?
What's the name of your best friend in your teens?
What was the first dish you learned?
What was the first movie you watched at the cinema?
Where was your first flight to visit?
What is the title of your favorite fairy tale book?
Where was the first city your parents met?
What is the name of the first beach you've been to?
What was the name of the first mountain you went to?
What is my favorite car model?

message.successDesc: The password reset question and answer has changed.
